content: Yes, The Nation understands that the issues of globalization and the environment are complex and can sometimes feel overwhelming. That's why they often provide a range of feasible solutions, from individual actions that readers can take to encourage political action and systemic change. By highlighting these solutions and offering ways to get involved, The Nation provides a platform for readers to channel their concerns into positive action. Taking these practical steps is a good way to feel empowered and to make a difference, no matter how small.
